Class OfflinePlayerSpigot

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.implementations.OfflinePlayerSpigot
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMessageable, IPlayer, ICommandSender
public final class OfflinePlayerSpigot extends Object implements IPlayer
Represents an implementation of IPlayer for the Spigot platform.

Pim

    • hasPermission

      public CompletableFuture<PermissionsStatus> hasPermission(CommandDefinition command)
      Description copied from interface: ICommandSender
      Checks if this sender has a given command.

      Both the user permission (See CommandDefinition.getUserPermission()) and the admin permission (See CommandDefinition.getAdminPermission()) are checked.

      Specified by:
      hasPermission in interface ICommandSender
      Specified by:
      hasPermission in interface IPlayer
      Parameters:
      command - The CommandDefinition of a command to check.
      Returns:
      A PermissionsStatus that is true if the player has access to the provided permissions, otherwise false for the user and the admin permission nodes respectively.
